description:
Dr. Bronner’s Pure-Castile Almond has a silky smooth lather and leaves your skin feeling smooth and nourished. Made with certified fair trade ingredients and organic hemp oil this biodegradable soap is good for the body and the mind.

  • Ingredients: organic coconut oil*, organic palm oil*, sodium hydroxide**, water, organic olive oil*, organic hemp oil, organic jojoba oil, natural almond fragrance, sea salt, citric acid and tocopherol. *Certified fair trade ingredients **None remains after saponifying oils into soap & glycerin
  • Biodegradable
  • Vegan
  • Comes in a post-consumer recycled wrapper
  • Not tear-free. Keep out of baby's eyes
name: Dr. Bronner's Pure-Castile Almond Bar Soap 140g
